formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen: Action: ShowDialPlan Synopsis: List dialplan Privilege: config,reporting,all Description: Show dialplan contexts and extensions. Be aware that showing the full dialplan may take a lot of capacity Variables: ActionID: <id> Action ID for this AMI transaction (optional) Extension: <extension> Extension (Optional) Context: <context> Context (Optional)

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
